short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Choose which file extensions to hide when looking at the diff. Click on a file's header to show/hide its diff.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Greater Github is a Chrome extension that allows you to optimize your experience when looking at code on Github.

You can also choose which file extensions you would like to hide.  For example, it is very useful when looking at Unity projects to hide .meta files and potentially files with other extensions.

This extension is not affiliated with Github.

This is derived from a Wider Github Chrome extension by tmlee: https://github.com/tmlee/wider_github
